    • make

      IBall make(Point p, int r, Point v, Color c, Component container, AConfigBallAlgo installAlgo, IModel2BallAdapter modelAdapter)
      Makes a new ball.
      Parameters:
      p - the position.
      r - the radius.
      v - the velocity.
      c - the color.
      container - the container.
      installAlgo - The algo to complete the installation of strategies and any other desired operations
      modelAdapter - The adapter to the model this ball is used in
      Returns:
      an IBall
